thread.title: U.S. crude slumps after Greek votes no to bailout
thread.title_full: U.S. crude slumps after Greek votes no to bailout

title: U.S. crude slumps after Greek votes no to bailout
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 6, 2015, 01:07 BST - UK Markets open in 6 hrs 53 mins U.S. crude slumps after Greek votes no to bailout Reuters – 27 minutes ago Print 
TOKYO (Reuters) - Oil prices slumped in early Asian trade on Monday after Greeks rejected conditions of a rescue package from creditors on Sunday, throwing the future of the country's euro zone membership into further doubt. 
U.S. crude went into freefall after the resounding vote, falling more than $2 to $54.81 at 0828 Tokyo time. Brent was down more than 1 percent at $59.60. 
(Reporting by Aaron Sheldrick; Editing by Michael Perry) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
